g.text: the local packaget set's list of packages
This will modify the `spago.dhall` file, which is used
- utilize Dhall's version of "Same Origin Policy"
- "patch"/"override" a dependency in the package set
- add packages (local or cloud) to the package set
7. There is no built-in cross-project 'cache' mechanism,
so you will need to do this process for each project,
which will re `git clone` each project's dependencies
